description:
Princess Ally`s Furfrou caught Ash and his friends in the courtyard of Parfum Palace.
When Princess Ally took a liking to Pikachu, she offered to battle Pikachu for the Flute to which an angry Ash and Pikachu agreed to. Pikachu won the match against Princess Ally`s Furfrou as Princess Ally forfeit the match because it wasn`t looking beautiful after a Thunderbolt wrecked its hair.
name: Trimmien (Princess Ally)
